name: frs-hide-scrollbar
description: Easy & lightweight solution for cross-browser scrollbar hiding

scripts.build:browser: node ./scripts/replace "let FRSHideScrollbar =" "let FRSHideScrollbar = window['FRSHideScrollbar'] =" src/scripts/FRSHideScrollbar.mjs | node ./scripts/replace "export default FRSHideScrollbar;" "" | google-closure-compiler  --compilationLevel ADVANCED --isolation_mode IIFE --assume_function_wrapper --js_output_file dist/FRS-hide-scrollbar.browser.js
scripts.build:example: parcel build docs/example.src.html -d docs --public-url /FRS-hide-scrollbar -o example.dist.html -o FRS-hide-scrollbar
scripts.postpublish: git add dist && git add docs
scripts.clean: rimraf dist/**/* && rimraf docs/*.dist.html && rimraf docs/report.html && rimraf docs/*.{js,css,map} && rimraf coverage

author: Jakub Freisler <FRSgit@users.noreply.github.com>
